title: Cursed Flame
summaries: Cursed Flame is a Hardmode crafting material, whose Crimson counterpart is Ichor. It is dropped by World Feeders, Vile Ghouls and Clingers, all of which can be found in The Corruption. It can also be found in Defiled Crates

statistics.Tooltip: 'Not even water can put the flame out'
statistics.Sell: 8
